title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 511-1.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 511-1.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) The provisions
of this Part are applicable to all providers of mental health services licensed
or operated by the Office of Mental Health that are seeking or have obtained
designation from the Office to offer EPSDT, Other Licensed Practitioner, and

Community Psychiatric Supports & Treatment Services. (b) This Part applies to non-licensed
providers of mental health services that received funding or have a contract
from the Office that are seeking or have obtained designation from the Office
to offer EPSDT Crisis Intervention Services, Family Peer Support Services, Youth Peer Support and Training, and Psychosocial Rehabilitation

Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
511-1.3

Renumbered from 511.3

New

York State Register July 17, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 29, eff. 7/17/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
